languages.text: {n}Губернатор закладывает руки за спину, то ли пытаясь принять позу поувереннее, то ли чтобы скрыть дрожь в пальцах.{/n} "В таком случае располагайтесь, проктор. Но прежде чем я передам вам все коды доступа, я должен..."

{n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор закладывает руки за спину, то ли пытаясь принять позу поувереннее, то ли чтобы скрыть дрожь в пальцах.{/n} "В таком случае располагайтесь, проктор. Но прежде чем я передам вам все коды доступа, я должен..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

{n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

{n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

{n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

{n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

{n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur verschränkt die Hände hinter seinem Rücken, um selbstbewusster zu wirken oder das Zittern seiner Finger zu verbergen.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, nehmt doch bitte Platz, Proktor. Aber bevor ich Euch die Zugangsodes gebe, muss ich ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur verschränkt die Hände hinter seinem Rücken, um selbstbewusster zu wirken oder das Zittern seiner Finger zu verbergen.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, nehmt doch bitte Platz, Proktor. Aber bevor ich Euch die Zugangsodes gebe, muss ich ..."

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur se tient les mains dans le dos, soit pour paraître plus confiant, soit pour cacher le tremblement de ses doigts.{/n} « Dans ce cas, faites comme chez vous, proctor. Mais avant de vous donner les codes d'accès, je dois... »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur se tient les mains dans le dos, soit pour paraître plus confiant, soit pour cacher le tremblement de ses doigts.{/n} « Dans ce cas, faites comme chez vous, proctor. Mais avant de vous donner les codes d'accès, je dois... »

languages.text: {n}El gobernador se lleva las manos a la espalda, ya sea para aparentar más confianza o para ocultar el temblor de sus dedos.{/n} «En tal caso, tenga la bondad de ponerse cómodo, Procurador. Pero antes de entregarle los códigos de acceso, debo...».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador se lleva las manos a la espalda, ya sea para aparentar más confianza o para ocultar el temblor de sus dedos.{/n} «En tal caso, tenga la bondad de ponerse cómodo, Procurador. Pero antes de entregarle los códigos de acceso, debo...».

languages.text: {n}总督将双手背在身后，或许是为了让自己看起来更加从容，也或许是为了掩饰不住颤抖的手指。{/n}“既然如此，请你酌情处理吧，监察官。不过，在告知密码之前，我得先——”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督将双手背在身后，或许是为了让自己看起来更加从容，也或许是为了掩饰不住颤抖的手指。{/n}“既然如此，请你酌情处理吧，监察官。不过，在告知密码之前，我得先——”

languages.text: {n}総督は両手を背中に回した。堂々と見せたいのか、あるいは震える指を隠したかったのかもしれない。{/n}「では、どうぞご自由に、代理人。ですが、アクセスコードをお渡しする前に、私が—」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は両手を背中に回した。堂々と見せたいのか、あるいは震える指を隠したかったのかもしれない。{/n}「では、どうぞご自由に、代理人。ですが、アクセスコードをお渡しする前に、私が—」

languages.text: {n}Vali, ellerini arkasında bağlıyor. Ya daha öz güvenli görünmeye ya da titreyen ellerini saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n} "O hâlde keyfinize bakın Üsteğmen. Ancak size erişim kodlarını vermeden önce ben..."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor puts his hands behind his back, either to appear more confident or to hide the tremor in his fingers.{/n} "In that case, please accommodate yourself, Proctor. But before I give you the access codes, I must—"
